pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fourier Analysis of Discharge Data // Computes discrete fast Fourier transform of river discharge data and the derived metrics. The methods are described in J. L. Sabo, D. M. Post (2008) doi:10.1890/06-1340.1 and J. L. Sabo, A. Ruhi, G. W. Holtgrieve, V. Elliott, M. E. Arias, P. B. Ngor, T. A. Rsnsen, S. Nam (2017) doi:10.1126/science.aao1053.
